revised_title: The Role of the Pituitary in Lactation Maintenance and Pituitary Grafts
tldr: The authors discuss the role of the pituitary gland in maintaining lactation and the effects of hormone replacement therapy on milk secretion. They also explore the use of pituitary grafts to maintain mammary function in hypophysectomized rats. The study highlights the importance of prolactin, adrenocorticotropin (ACTH), and possibly growth hormone (GH) in lactation maintenance.
